instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: A1369 820-2838-A no power
threads.message:
Hi,

I have an A1369 820-2838-A that has no power. I have green light, but no fan spin.
The first voltage that i missed in the power rails are:

PP3V3_S3 = 0V
PP5V_S3 = 0V

Couldn't figure iut where they are created to follow the trace. Can you help?

threads.title: A1369 820-2838-A no power
threads.message:
This board will not turn on without pressing power button.
Do you get L7750 voltage?

threads.title: A1369 820-2838-A no power
threads.message:
This schematic has the power on sequence on page 3.
Did you check PM_PWRBTN_L reaction?

threads.title: A1369 820-2838-A no power
threads.message:
tks for the tip on the power on sequence  page.
PM_PWRBTN_L  gets low when SMC_ONOFF_L gets pressed and i have fan spin. It seams that the problem is the power buttun.

TKS!.
